channel.title: Payment service on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in Payment service on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Bitpay Logo BitPay is a bitcoin payment service provider headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, United States. It was founded in May 2011 by Tony Gallippi and Stephen Pair. BitPay provides Bitcoin and Bitcoin Cash payment processing services for merchants. Source
You can download theBitpaylogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: Bitpay
item.description: BitPay is a bitcoin payment service provider headquartered in Atlanta, Georgia, United States. It was founded in May 2011 by Tony Gallippi and Stephen Pair. BitPay provides Bitcoin and Bitcoin Cash payment processing services for merchants. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
2C2P Logo 2C2P is a Southeast Asia-based payments provider that works with global enterprises to accept payments across online, mobile and offline channels, as well as provide issuing, payouts, remittance and digital goods aggregation and reselling services. It is co-headquartered in Singapore and Bangkok and operates across Southeast Asia and Europe. Source
You can download the2C2Plogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
item.title: 2C2P
item.description: 2C2P is a Southeast Asia-based payments provider that works with global enterprises to accept payments across online, mobile and offline channels, as well as provide issuing, payouts, remittance and digital goods aggregation and reselling services. It is co-headquartered in Singapore and Bangkok and operates across Southeast Asia and Europe. Source

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 Atom Technologies Logo
Atom Technologies Limited is a payment services provider company, headquartered in Mumbai, India. Atom was started in 2006 and is a subsidiary of the Financial Technologies Group, founded by Jignesh Shah. The company has historically focused upon the distribution of payment and banking services through the use of mobile technology. Atom Technologies has provided products and services for mobile payments, interactive voice response based payments, and mobile-based service distribution framework.
You can download theAtomlogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: Atom
item.description: Atom Technologies Limited is a payment services provider company, headquartered in Mumbai, India. Atom was started in 2006 and is a subsidiary of the Financial Technologies Group, founded by Jignesh Shah. The company has historically focused upon the distribution of payment and banking services through the use of mobile technology. Atom Technologies has provided products and services for mobile payments, interactive voice response based payments, and mobile-based service distribution framework.

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
Qiwi Logo Qiwi is a publicly traded Russian payment service provider headquartered in Nicosia, that operates electronic online payment systems primarily in Russia, Ukraine, Kazakhstan, Moldova, Belarus, Romania, the United States, and the United Arab Emirates. Source
You can download theQiwilogo on full-version of the page. ]] >
